message: Let's split it evenly, no need to overthink it!
You're being too generous, I'll take the majority
You're getting a bit greedy, but I'll give you a better deal this time
You're getting desperate, I'll take most of the crumbs
I'm still willing to compromise, but don't expect me to give away the farm
You're running out of time, I'll take almost all
I'm making a last-ditch effort to get a decent share
You're down to your last chance, take it or leave it
I'm making a final stand, take it or leave it
You're almost out of time, I'll take almost everything
I'm out of options, you win
